page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN DOVE HOLES.
page.content: In the early part of this century most people worked in the quarries,some at the shirt works on Meadow Lane. There were about l0 quarries.The smaller ones amalgamated to form Buxton Lime later taken over by Staveley & ICI.The Peak Forest Tramway was working between the quarries & Buxworth. Today people travel out of Dove Holes to work-places which include Chapel, Buxton,Castleton,Chinley,Whaley Bridge,Manchester,Stockport,Bristol & Stuttgart. Occupations include hairdressing,rail- way,banking,quarrying,building,teach- ing,shopwork,nursing,police,lorry-driv ing,mining,&factory work. People make good use of the regular bus & train service between Buxton & Manchester and many have their own transport.
